search.query: | inputlookup nesa_volume_groups | stats count by arrayId, arrayName
`get_nesa_index` sourcetype=eseries:mel-events host="$arrayId$" priority="priorityCritical" | stats distinct_count(sequenceNumber) AS count
`get_nesa_index` sourcetype=eseries:mel-events host="$arrayId$" priority="priorityInfo" | stats distinct_count(sequenceNumber) AS count

`get_nesa_index` sourcetype=eseries:mel-events host="$arrayId$" priority="$priority$" | stats min(_time) AS _time, first(_raw) AS _raw by host, sequenceNumber | fields - sequenceNumber | spath | eval eventType=tostring(eventType, "hex")." ".description | top eventType showperc=false

chart.title: Array Events by Priority Over Time

search.query: `get_nesa_index` sourcetype=eseries:mel-events host="$arrayId$" priority="$priority$" | eval priority=replace(priority, "priority", "") | timechart dc(sequenceNumber) AS count by priority

`get_nesa_index` sourcetype=eseries:mel-events host="$arrayId$" priority="$priority$" | rename comment AS "Deduplicate this, based on the sequenceNumber field" | stats min(_time) AS _time, min(_indextime) AS first_seen, max(_indextime) AS last_seen, first(_raw) AS _raw by host, sequenceNumber | fields - sequenceNumber | spath | `ctime(timeStamp)` AS stamp | `ctime(*seen)` | eval priority=replace(priority, "priority", "") | eval eventType=tostring(eventType, "hex") | JOIN type=LEFT host [inputlookup array_controller_label.csv | rename arrayId as host | table host, arrayName] | eval Time=_time | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(Time) | table Time, first_seen, last_seen, arrayName, stamp, priority, critical, description, sequenceNumber, eventType, category, componentType, componentLocation.label, eventSourceController | rename first_seen AS "First seen" last_seen AS "Last seen" priority AS Priority arrayName AS Array stamp AS Stamp critical AS Critical description AS Description sequenceNumber AS "Sequence #" eventType AS "Event Type" category AS Category componentType AS "Component Type" componentLocation.label AS "Component Location" eventSourceController AS "Source Controller"
